author: Detroit Free Press, Susan Tompor, Detroit Free Press
title: Struggling to pay the bills, restaurants, other small businesses find a friend in banks
description: Banks are being proactive to avoid massive defaults as temporary shutdowns across the economy take place to stem the tide of COVID-19.
content:
Don Haley, 56, owner of Italia Gardens, delivers free lunches to healthcare workers at Ascension Genesys in Grand Blanc. Haley expects to take out more small business loans to stay afloat during the coronavirus pandemic.
 (Photo: Haley family)
